answerText: Georgia [or Sakartvelo][10] Tskhinvali is the capital of this breakaway region invaded by Georgia in 2008, a move which saw swift retribution from Russia.
heading: ACF Regionals  |2012 | Wellesley + Hunter  | 21 | Geography | None | College
subject: Geography
question: Question: This nation's capital lies on the Mtkvari River. For 10 points each: [10] Name this country whose other cities include Gori, Batumi, and, arguably, Tskhinvali.
